author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Fixes #5181 

The help package is updated to only have default help. All the other help content can be downloaded using `Update-Help`

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan 2 test failed in AppVeyor CI. Please take a look. Also, can you please add `[Feature]` tag in the next commit so we can validate all help related tests?

title: Updated csproj to use the latest help package
